comment.author: 35305344@N02
comment._content:
i know this is not an original thought but for the sakes of those who are always looking anew it's absolutely boggling how photography has completely transformed the world in a myriad of ways

& image is- important

but image itself must-- evolve

that is the catch

i dont think we fully realize how the evolution of our concepts of --- everything ( beauty- sex, love everything- )  - is effecting us & the world 

enhanced dimensions are incomparable 

science is not perfect 
but its winning it has to win

superficiality & superstition are treated like new but are actually dense old, antique obsolete

or- they are, moving out

have to

image is a vital part of it- we are realizing that this surface bs is terrifying- there is no such thing

everything runs deep for better or worse cause & effect
its the truth
& stunningly truly beautiful to think about as far as how our values might shift
self realizable
individuation
immense creativity

love--
revolutionary concepts of spatial reality-etc liberated from one dimensional thinking
... .... ..
